sentences.en: Cenarius: Who dares defile this ancient land? Who dares the wrath of Cenarius and elves?
sentences.cn: 塞纳留斯: 是谁胆敢玷污这片陈旧的土地? 是谁胆敢触怒塞纳留斯和暗夜精灵?

sentences.en: Hallam’s tomb had been defiled and looted.
sentences.cn: 哈勒姆的坟墓遭到了亵渎和洗劫。

sentences.en: He shall not defile himself , as a leader among his people , so as to profane himself.
sentences.cn: 4祭司既在民中为首领,就不可从俗玷辱自己.

sentences.en: Huntresses are strong , swift, and merciless to those who would defile the sanctity of Ashenvale Forest.
sentences.cn: 女猎手强壮灵巧, 并且对敢于玷污神圣的灰谷森林的敌人毫不怜悯.

sentences.en: Likewise also these filthy dreamers defile the flesh , despise dominion, and speak evil of dignities.
sentences.cn: 这些作梦的人,也像他们污秽身体,轻慢主治的, 毁谤在尊位的.

sentences.en: Mk. 7:23 All these wicked things proceed from within and defile the man.
sentences.cn: 可七23这一切的恶,都是从里面发出来,且能污秽人.

sentences.en: Nevertheless in like manner these dreamers also defile the flesh and despise lordship and revile dignities.
sentences.cn: 8然而,这些作梦的人,还是照样玷污肉体,轻慢主治者,毁谤在尊位的.

sentences.en: Presently this defile took a turn, and a lovely sight unfolded itself to my eyes.
sentences.cn: 不一会儿,小路转了个弯, 一派美丽的景色展现在我的眼前.

sentences.en: Take heed , therefore, and defile not with all kinds of abominations the temple of your bodies.
sentences.cn: 因此, 小心不要让所有的讨厌之物污染了你们身体的庙宇.

sentences.en: The Agheila defile was kernel of the situation.
sentences.cn: 阿盖拉隘路是全局的核心.

sentences.en: The troops had to defile through the pass.
sentences.cn: 部队只得排成单列通过关口.

sentences.en: These are what defile a person, but to eat with unwashed hands does not defile.
sentences.cn: 这些都使人污秽, 至于不洗手吃饭,并不能使人污秽.

sentences.en: To do harm to ( property or qualities considered sacred ); desecrate or defile.
sentences.cn: 伤害 ( 认为神圣的特性或品质 ); 亵渎或玷污.

sentences.en: Who are these men who defile the grassy borders of our roads and lanes.
sentences.cn: 是谁污损了我们大路和小路两旁的草坪.

trans.tran_en: to make something less pure and good, especially by showing no respect

trans.tran_cn: 玷污，污染，弄脏，纵列行进
